docker.name: RUN
docker.raw: RUN yum install -y tar which gzip

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: mkdir -p /usr/share/maven /usr/share/maven/ref   && curl -fsSL -o /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz ${BASE_URL}/apache-maven-${MAVEN_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz   && echo "${SHA}  /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz" | sha512sum -c -   && tar -xzf /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz -C /usr/share/maven --strip-components=1   && rm -f /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz   && ln -s /usr/share/maven/bin/mvn /usr/bin/mvn
docker.raw: RUN mkdir -p /usr/share/maven /usr/share/maven/ref   && curl -fsSL -o /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz ${BASE_URL}/apache-maven-${MAVEN_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz   && echo "${SHA}  /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz" | sha512sum -c -   && tar -xzf /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz -C /usr/share/maven --strip-components=1   && rm -f /tmp/apache-maven.tar.gz   && ln -s /usr/share/maven/bin/mvn /usr/bin/mvn
